prompt: Centered, print-ready clean vector illustration and typographic design on a vibrant hot pink solid background. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. Main composition: a bold comic-style panel in the center showing a small cartoon dog sitting at a round table with a mug, surrounded by stylized yellow and orange flames and rising smoke; inside the panel a speech bubble reads TEXT English: "THIS IS FINE." All elements (text and graphics) are isolated and must have a thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. Top headline: TEXT Hungarian: "JELENLEGI ÁLLAPOTOM:" (above) centered above the panel in large all-caps bold condensed rounded sans-serif with distressed white fill and heavy black outline; panel sits beneath the headline; bottom slogan: TEXT Hungarian: "STABILAN INSTABIL" (below) centered beneath the panel in matching bold rounded sans-serif, large all-caps, distressed white fill and the same thick black outline. Typography details: high-contrast, chunky letterforms, even stroke weight, slight vintage halftone/worn texture inside white fills for a comic-vintage feel but keep outlines solid and uniform; no drop shadows. Graphics style: simplified flat-color cartoon with clean shapes, limited palette, crisp vector fills, exaggerated flame shapes in yellow/orange, muted olive-green interior panel background, warm brown dog, simple wooden table and mug; everything vector-clean and centered, print-ready. Composition: tight vertical stack (headline, comic panel, slogan), balanced white space, no background gradients or extra elements beyond the isolated artwork, no photorealism, high-resolution vector look suitable for screen printing.
negative_prompt: no garment, no mockup, no fabric texture, no shadows, no photo, no background scene, no frame or border, no watermark, no blurriness, no low-res, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting
